Depuis ses débuts prometteurs sur Etsy, Green & Paper a su faire son nid ! En effet, la créatrice Marilyne a lancé la vente de ses jolis produits en ligne sur Etsy en novembre 2014. Forte de son succès, Green & Paper possède désormais son propre e-shop !

[{"id":"98f4f5ae-066a-11e8-b47a-a0369fec98a0","streamId":"976dbca4-328f-11e4-875f-782bcb074bd1","link":"https://www.designboom.com/art/pip-pop-corey-helford-gallery-01-31-2018/","title":"pip & pop’s psychadelic candy mountains are dripping with selfish desire","content":"
can you hear them? they're singing.
The post pip & pop’s psychadelic candy mountains are dripping with selfish desire appeared first on designboom | architecture & design magazine.
","enclosures":[{"link":"https://www.designboom.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/Pip-Pop-designboom-818.jpg","type":"image","source":"content","height":600,"width":818}],"guid":"1yr65xo","publishedAt":1517391011,"createdAt":1517391553,"source":{"link":"https://www.designboom.com/","title":"designboom | architecture & design magazine"},"themes":["Pop music","Folk music","Sugar","Magic in fiction","Ceramic","Rock music","Cake","Psychedelic music","String instrument","Asteroid family","Clay","Cockaigne","Utopia","Flora","Kawaii","Hoard","Folklore"]},{"id":"f32dd475-0666-11e8-8e12-a0369feca080","streamId":"4703b82e-32af-11e4-87a9-782bcb074bd1","link":"http://retaildesignblog.net/2018/01/31/muji-store-by-super-potato-shenzen-china/","title":"Muji store by Super Potato, Shenzen – China","content":"


A variety of shelving, displays and decorations add to the retailer's lifestyle focus and the unique shopping experience that comes with it. Inspired by movement and poetry that emerges from it, the perfumer has created an exclusive range of scented candles. The Ellen MacArthur Foundation has teamed up with design and consulting firm IDEO to create a guide that helps businesses design for the circular economy. Read more

","enclosures":[{"link":"https://static.dezeen.com/uploads/2018/01/circular-economy-circular-design-guide-launch-davos-dezeen-sq-822x822.jpg","type":"image","source":"content","height":822,"width":822}],"guid":"11y4fc7","publishedAt":1517382022,"createdAt":1517382653,"fullLink":"https://www.dezeen.com/2018/01/31/guide-design-circular-economy-launches-davos-ideo-ellen-macarthur-foundation/?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+dezeen+%28Dezeenfeed%29","domain":"www.dezeen.com","media":"blogs","source":{"link":"https://www.dezeen.com/","title":"Dezeen"},"themes":["Circular economy","Plastic pollution","Chief executive officer","Integral","Ecosystem","Coca-Cola","Evian","L'Oréal","Biodegradation","Momentum","Wood"]},{"id":"1b9cf58c-0658-11e8-b9a6-a0369fec927c","streamId":"3541b0b7-3384-11e4-b54b-a4badb4444dc","link":"http://www.madaboutthehouse.com/gorgeous-bathroom-accessories/","title":"Gorgeous Bathroom Accessories","content":"
So there we were moaning about how long January was taking – especially those on the no booze, no meat, no spending, no fun, end of the spectrum when poof it was over. I’m assuming you’ll all be rolling in the aisles tonight drinking wine, eating chicken and, just in case you have freed up…
The post Gorgeous Bathroom Accessories appeared first on Mad About The House.
","enclosures":[{"link":"http://www.madaboutthehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/bilton-bathroom-shelf-from-rowen-and-wren-300x300.jpg","type":"image","height":"300","width":"300"},{"link":"https://www.madaboutthehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/bilton-bathroom-shelf-from-rowen-and-wren-e1517333354538.jpg","type":"image","source":"full_content","height":750,"width":750}],"guid":"1lnsavl","publishedAt":1517381155,"createdAt":1517383612,"fullLink":"https://www.madaboutthehouse.com/gorgeous-bathroom-accessories/","domain":"www.madaboutthehouse.com","media":"blogs","source":{"link":"http://www.madaboutthehouse.com/","title":"Mad About The House"},"themes":["Brass","Electromagnetic spectrum","Wine","Chicken","Teetotalism","Toothbrush","Hawaii Undersea Research Laboratory","Nickel","Tottenham Court Road","Flagship","Compact car"]},{"id":"fda7b78c-0653-11e8-8692-a0369fec9378","streamId":"cb443f84-31ec-11e4-8720-782bcb074bd1","link":"http://www.desiretoinspire.net/blog/2018/1/31/stalking-a-family-home-in-melbourne.html","title":"Stalking a family home in Melbourne","content":"

We're stalking a family house in the Melbourne suburb of Northcote, a house of two halves, old and new. You'd never know from its weatherboard cottage facade that behind is a light-filled, contemporary open plan home perfect, as you can see from the photos, for a young family. Inside and out meld seamlessly through sliding glass doors, extending the living space out into the courtyard garden. Stylish and kid friendly. Link here while it lasts.

[{"id":"44b01dad-066a-11e8-8740-a0369fec9818","streamId":"c3dfba23-32a4-11e4-878f-782bcb074bd1","link":"http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/Frandroid/~3/hv3pK0GoO1c/485791_samsung-mobile-nest-pas-aussi-en-forme-quil-ny-parait-la-concurrence-est-rude","title":"Samsung Mobile n’est pas aussi en forme qu’il n’y paraît : la concurrence est rude","content":"
Les résultats au quatrième trimestre de Samsung ont été postés, nous permettant de constater que la division mobile du groupe n’est pas en très grande forme. La concurrence chinoise se fait sentir.

Nous sommes en fin janvier, faisant que la plupart des constructeurs vont poster leurs résultats financiers sur le quatrième trimestre. Samsung ouvre le bal avec des chiffres très bons pour l’entreprise, mais moins pour le mobile.
Une année 2017 prospère pour Samsung
Samsung Electron","enclosures":[{"link":"http://images.frandroid.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/samsung-1000x684.jpg","type":"image","source":"content","height":684,"width":1000}],"guid":"2gxd2k","publishedAt":1517390778,"createdAt":1517391412,"fullLink":"http://www.frandroid.com/marques/samsung/485791_samsung-mobile-nest-pas-aussi-en-forme-quil-ny-parait-la-concurrence-est-rude?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+Frandroid+%28FrAndroid%29","domain":"www.frandroid.com","media":"press and media","source":{"link":"http://www.frandroid.com/","title":"FrAndroid"},"themes":["Won","Mémoire vive","Mémoire flash","Smartphone"]},{"id":"2a263050-0667-11e8-b8f1-a0369fec9dcc","streamId":"e8205799-3420-11e4-8830-782bcb074bd1","link":"http://www.phonandroid.com/oneplus-5t-revolutionne-navigation-android-copiant-liphone-x.html","title":"Le OnePlus 5T révolutionne la navigation sur Android en copiant l’iPhone X","content":"
OnePlus vient de mettre en ligne une nouvelle version bêta sur son OnePlus 5T. Cette version test est équipée de "gestes de navigation" qui rappellent beaucoup l'iPhone X. Comment cette nouveauté parvient-elle à révolutionner la navigation sur Android ? 
Cet article Le OnePlus 5T révolutionne la navigation sur Android en copiant l’iPhone X est apparu en premier sur PhonAndroid.
","enclosures":[{"link":"http://img.phonandroid.com/2018/01/iphone-x-oneplus-5t-105x55.jpg","type":"image","image":"http://img.phonandroid.com/2018/01/iphone-x-oneplus-5t-105x55.jpg","height":55,"width":105},{"link":"http://img.phonandroid.com/2018/01/iphone-x-oneplus-5t.jpg","type":"image","source":"full_content","height":737,"width":1200}],"guid":"1ez8132","publishedAt":1517389290,"createdAt":1517390080,"source":{"link":"http://www.phonandroid.com/","title":"PhonAndroid"},"themes":["IPhone","Android","Smartphone","IOS (Apple)","Multitâche","Système d'exploitation","Microsoft Windows","Universal Serial Bus"]},{"id":"44b01dac-066a-11e8-8740-a0369fec9818","streamId":"c3dfba23-32a4-11e4-878f-782bcb074bd1","link":"http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/Frandroid/~3/TwMgjNSKT9k/485785_la-navigation-de-liphone-x-sur-le-oneplus-5t-une-bonne-idee","title":"La navigation de l’iPhone X sur le OnePlus 5T : une bonne idée ?","content":"
Le OnePlus 5T s’essaye à une interface similaire à celle de l’iPhone X. Vraie bonne idée ou fausse piste ? 

Le OnePlus 5T lorgne visiblement sur… l’iPhone. Le smartphone vient en effet de se doter, grâce aux nouveautés du 30 janvier de sa bêta Oreo, d’une fonctionnalité nommée « Gestes de navigation ».
Cette interface s’éloigne des pratiques habituelles sur Android et rappelle à plus d’un titre certaines fonctionnalités du dernier iPhone d’Apple, comme le montre le","enclosures":[{"link":"http://images.frandroid.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/oneplus-5t-sandstone-white-16-1000x563.jpg","type":"image","source":"content","height":1294,"width":2300}],"guid":"69g1mc","publishedAt":1517388778,"createdAt":1517391412,"fullLink":"http://www.frandroid.com/marques/oneplus/485785_la-navigation-de-liphone-x-sur-le-oneplus-5t-une-bonne-idee?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+Frandroid+%28FrAndroid%29","domain":"www.frandroid.com","media":"press and media","source":{"link":"http://www.frandroid.com/","title":"FrAndroid"},"themes":["IPhone","Smartphone","Android","Test de performance"]},{"id":"f2f9ee19-0662-11e8-b348-a0369fec9dc8","streamId":"e8205799-3420-11e4-8830-782bcb074bd1","link":"http://www.phonandroid.com/galaxy-x-samsung-confirme-smartphone-pliant-2018.html","title":"Galaxy X : Samsung confirme son smartphone pliant pour 2018","content":"
Le Galaxy X pourrait bel et bien débarquer dès 2018 ! Dans son bilan du dernier trimestre 2017, Samsung évoque le smartphone à écran pliable comme un des produits forts de la marque avec le Galaxy S9 pour l'année à venir. 
Cet article Galaxy X : Samsung confirme son smartphone pliant pour 2018 est apparu en premier sur PhonAndroid.

Alors que le gouvernement cherche à trouver des solutions pour lutter contre l’obsolescence programmée, cette initiative prouve qu’il est possible d’avoir des appareils plus résistants.

Bitmoji, l’application de Snap permettant de réaliser son propre avatar a reçu une importante mise à jour. Cette mise à jour, nommée Bitmoji Deluxe va permettre de personnaliser encore plus son avatar avec un ajout important d’options.

Les nouveautés de Bitmoji
L’application Bitmoji, utilisée pour créer son propre avatar sur Bitmoji et Snapchat, a été mise à jour aujourd’hui. Les indicateurs du marché des smartphones se suivent et ne se ressemblent pas forcément. Alors qu’Apple semblait en difficulté sur la période de trois mois se terminant en novembre 2017, les derniers chiffres de Kantar Worldpanel sont beaucoup plus positifs! Sur les cinq grands marchés européens, iOS a gagné 0,7 point, notamment grâce à l’iPhone X.…
Suite →

outline.snapshot:
[{"id":"ec359152-0668-11e8-b47a-a0369fec98a0","streamId":"a710b130-3442-11e4-b6bd-a4badb4444dc","link":"http://www.f1i.fr/infos/pirelli-veut-signer-nouveau-contrat-cette-annee/","title":"Pirelli veut signer son nouveau contrat cette année","content":"

Pirelli espère parvenir à un nouvel accord avec Liberty Media, le propriétaire de la Formule 1, dans le courant de cette année pour rester le manufacturier unique de pneumatiques de F1.
Le contrat liant Pirelli à la Formule 1, qui a été signé lorsque Bernie Ecclestone était encore aux commandes de la discipline, doit expirer à la fin de la saison 2019.

Programmé le 24 juin, le Grand Prix de France est actuellement en confrontation directe avec le match Angleterre-Panama de la Coupe du monde de football, lui aussi prévu à 14 heures.
Liberty Media envisage donc de donner le départ du Grand Prix de France à 16h10. Par Alessio Piana / Corsedimoto.com, 29 janvier 2018, 20:27
Aux 24 Heures Motos au Mans en FIM EWC, Manuel Poggiali revient avec bonheur à la course: le double Champion du Monde courra avec la Panigale R du Special Ducati Team by Z Racing.
Le Championnat du Monde d’Endurance FIM EWC s’est enrichi d’un Champion du Monde prêt à contribuer à la cause d’une équipe italienne ambitieuse. ","enclosures":[{"link":"https://www.actuanews.fr/photo/art/default/19825995-23550207.jpg?v=1517316914","type":"image","source":"content","height":430,"width":645}],"guid":"1x13p0o","publishedAt":1517385600,"createdAt":1517389528,"fullLink":"https://www.actuanews.fr/Decouvrez-la-bande-annonce-de-Les-dents%C2%A0pipi-et-au-lit-avec-Louise-Bourgoin_a39151.html?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+actuamusic%2FfPjC+%28ActuaMusic.fr%29","domain":"www.actuanews.fr","media":"press and media","source":{"link":"https://www.actuanews.fr/xml/atom.xml","title":"ActuaNews.fr"}},{"id":"f7355ff4-0667-11e8-b47a-a0369fec98a0","streamId":"dc2e31df-38f5-11e4-8a23-782bcb074bd1","link":"http://www.goutemesdisques.com/news/article/cut-worms-devoile-le-premier-titre-de-son-prochain-album/","title":"Cut Worms dévoile le premier titre de son prochain album","content":"

Quelques mois après la parution d'un EP terriblement attachant intitulé Alien Sunset sur lequel figurait notamment la magnifique et très cathartique "Like Going Down Sideways", Max Clarke alias Cut Worms semble bien décidé à surfer sur les dithyrambes afin de sortir de l'anonymat, notamment avec la parution de son premier album toujours sur Jagjaguwar. C'est donc dans cet optique que le taciturne Américain s'est fendu d'un nouveau single issu du long format à venir (et pour lequel a","enclosures":[{"link":"http://www.goutemesdisques.com/uploads/_processed_/csm_Capture_d_ecran_2018-01-30_a_18.13.03_55a7d63020.png","type":"image","source":"content","height":230,"width":230},{"link":"http://www.goutemesdisques.com/uploads/_processed_/csm_Capture_d_ecran_2018-01-30_a_18.13.03_690407c9a9.png","type":"image","source":"full_content","height":230,"width":230}],"guid":"5qct9r","publishedAt":1517384806,"createdAt":1517390424,"source":{"link":"http://www.goutemesdisques.com/","title":"Goûte Mes Disques"},"themes":["Extended play","Alien (film)","Catharsis","Sideways","Dithyrambe","Lo-fi","Romantisme","Studios Olympic"]}]

But have you seen a super and a blue and a blood moon? A super blue blood moon.
 
Probably. Either way it's something fun and gets people to look up as opposed to looking down at their smart phones all their bloody lives.
 
I mean I'm sure all this heads up to what the moon will be is a modern thing. I don't recall getting such updates when I was younger. Not to mention when I was younger I was hugely into Astronomy so it's kinda thing I would have been made aware of.
﻿
","enclosures":[],"guid":"orgh4n","publishedAt":1517391406,"createdAt":1517391671,"fullLink":"http://community.eu.playstation.com/t5/PlayStation-Off-Topic/Random-banter/m-p/25521527","domain":"community.eu.playstation.com","media":"press and media","source":{"link":"http://community.eu.playstation.com/t5/English-Forums/ct-p/55","title":"All board posts in English Forums"},"themes":["Full moon"]},{"id":"274ebe80-066a-11e8-8e14-a0369feca080","streamId":"cfb5f667-31e1-11e4-8720-782bcb074bd1","link":"https://www.vg247.com/2018/01/31/world-of-warcraft-battle-for-azeroth-releases-this-summer-pre-ordering-unlocks-allied-races-early/","title":"World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth releases this summer, pre-ordering unlocks Allied Races early","content":"
Blizzard has announced a release window for World of Warcraft’s upcoming expansion, Battle for Azeroth.

World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth, which was announced at BlizzCon last year, will be released sometime this Summer.
Blizzard has announced today that the expansion is now available for pre-purchase through the Blizzard store, and the in-game shop. If you pre-order a digital copy, you’ll get a level 110 character boost you can use anytime to get you to end-gear content.
You’ll also","enclosures":[{"link":"https://assets.vg247.com/current/2017/11/world_of_warcraft_battle_for_azeroth_cinematic-768x384.jpg","type":"image","source":"content","height":384,"width":768}],"guid":"1xedz81","publishedAt":1517391275,"createdAt":1517391363,"source":{"link":"https://www.vg247.com/","title":"VG247"},"themes":["Warcraft","Digital distribution","BlizzCon","Elf","Races and factions of Warcraft","Tiras","Hearthstone (video game)","StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty","Characters of Overwatch"]},{"id":"dee45017-066a-11e8-bacc-a0369fec937c","streamId":"043c65da-3a20-11e7-8354-782bcb10f569","link":"http://community.eu.playstation.com/t5/PS4-Support/Do-replay-audio-Bluetooth-headphones-work-on-ps4/m-p/25521524#M116841","title":"Do replay audio Bluetooth headphones work on ps4","content":"No Bluetooth headset will work directly with the ps4. A few hours ago, we posted some gameplay footage of Aegislash. Now, the Japanese Pokemon channel has shadow sneaked in a trailer, as well. From first impressions, this guy seems like a sacred sword with an iron defense. A noble Pokemon, Aegislash is said to recognize trainers who have the innate qualities of royalty. I wonder if you can make...
The post Pokken Tournament DX: Aegislash trailer appeared first on Nintendo Everything.

Jose Mourinho believes Marcus Rashford will still get chances to impress. (AFP/Getty Images)Jose Mourinho insists Marcus Rashford’s development will not hindered by the arrival of Alexis Sanchez at Manchester United.
Competition for places in United’s attack has increased following the Chilean’s move to Old Trafford, and Rashford’s minutes could be restricted as a result.

Manchester United forward Zlatan Ibrahimovic has reportedly already agreed terms with Los Angeles Galaxy ahead of a possible transfer. 
According to L'Equipe (h/t Harry Slavin of the MailOnline), the veteran striker struck a deal with the Major League Soccer franchise "three weeks ago."
Sky Sports reported that the club are declining to comment on the speculation linking them with a move for the Swede.
Ibrahimovic is out of contract at the end of the season, having previously signed a one-yea","enclosures":[],"guid":"19h3uwa","publishedAt":1517385640,"createdAt":1517387456,"source":{"link":"http://bleacherreport.com/","title":"Bleacher Report - World Football"},"themes":["Association football","Zlatan Ibrahimović","England national football team manager","José Mourinho","Amulet","EFL Cup","UEFA Europa League"]},{"id":"e2fe6cb0-065c-11e8-873d-a0369fec9818","streamId":"203abbee-4b15-11e4-9048-782bcb10ee8c","link":"http://metro.co.uk/2018/01/31/zlatan-ibrahimovic-seal-la-galaxy-transfer-signing-agreement-three-weeks-ago-7274554/","title":"Zlatan Ibrahimovic to seal LA Galaxy transfer after signing agreement three weeks ago","content":"






Zlatan Ibrahimovic could be on his way out of Manchester United (Picture: Getty)Zlatan Ibrahimovic has agreed a deal to join LA Galaxy and has already signed a contract with the MLS side, reports say.
The Manchester United striker is currently concentrating on rebuilding his fitness levels and has not featured for his side since Boxing Day.
Ibrahimovic returned too early from a serious knee injury, and the decision was taken to give the 36-year-old more time to recover.

FORMER Chelsea striker Samuel Eto’o has moved to Turkish club Konyaspor – and was mobbed by fans at the airport.
The Barcelona and Inter Milan legend, 36, has spent the past two-and-a-half seasons at Antalyaspor.
Getty - Contributor Former Chelsea and Barcelona striker Samuel Eto’o has moved to Konyaspor[/caption]
Eto’o moves to a club currently locked in a relegation battle in the Turkish Super Lig.
Konyaspor are 17th, out of 18, seven points ahead of bottom club Kardemir Karabukspor","enclosures":[{"link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nintchdbpict000380004409.jpg?strip=all&w=960","type":"image","source":"content","height":647,"width":960}],"guid":"13qiaa2","publishedAt":1517386834,"createdAt":1517386890,"source":{"link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/","title":"Football news - transfers, fixtures, scores, pictures | The Sun"},"themes":["Midfielder","Süper Lig","Battle","Kardemir Karabükspor","Peaked cap","Brooch","Turkish Cup","Petr Čech","Australian dollar","Land of Oz","Spanish language","UEFA Champions League","Boy soprano","José Mourinho"]},{"id":"07a1ca67-0663-11e8-8699-a0369fec9378","streamId":"25e94b2a-5aee-11e5-8f72-842b2b71ea40","link":"http://www.football365.com/news/deadline-day-live-blog-aubameyang-mahrez-giroud","title":"Deadline Day live blog: Aubameyang, Mahrez, Giroud","content":"
Before you read on, have you read our guide to who needs what on Deadline Day? Have you read our review of Deadline Days past? Have you checked out all the completed deals? Well do all three…
 
8.32am – Is Mangala going to be loaned out?

A number of clubs are being linked with Man City defender Eliaquim Mangala today https://t.co/OoZvoUtRu3 #DeadlineDay pic.twitter.com/So0HJYbWOv
— BBC Sport (@BBCSport) January 31, 2018


BBC Sport are bob on, there. Newcastle, Everton and Valencia have","enclosures":[{"link":"http://d2x51gyc4ptf2q.cloudfront.net/content/uploads/2018/01/20135458/Pierre-Emerick-Aubameyang-Borussia-Dortmund.jpg","type":"image","source":"full_content","height":367,"width":700}],"guid":"1d1mli2","publishedAt":1517386224,"createdAt":1517388303,"source":{"link":"http://www.football365.com/","title":"Football365"},"themes":["Mangala","Midfielder","Blog","Association football positions","José Mourinho","Arsène Wenger"]},{"id":"e2fe6cb0-065c-11e8-873d-a0369fec9818","streamId":"203abbee-4b15-11e4-9048-782bcb10ee8c","link":"http://metro.co.uk/2018/01/31/zlatan-ibrahimovic-seal-la-galaxy-transfer-signing-agreement-three-weeks-ago-7274554/","title":"Zlatan Ibrahimovic to seal LA Galaxy transfer after signing agreement three weeks ago","content":"






Zlatan Ibrahimovic could be on his way out of Manchester United (Picture: Getty)Zlatan Ibrahimovic has agreed a deal to join LA Galaxy and has already signed a contract with the MLS side, reports say.
The Manchester United striker is currently concentrating on rebuilding his fitness levels and has not featured for his side since Boxing Day.
Ibrahimovic returned too early from a serious knee injury, and the decision was taken to give the 36-year-old more time to recover.
More: Football
